si.title: IYA ට උපහාරයක්
body_lines: පසුව ආර්. සම්පත්තන් හි අවමංගල්යය ඔහුගේ උපන් ගම ත්රිකුණාමලය වෙත ගෙන යන අතර අවමංගල්ය කටයුතු පැවැත්වේ.

en.title: A tribute to Iya
body_lines: Former President of the Tamil National Alliance (TNA)
Subsequently, the funeral of R. Sampanthan will be taken to his hometown of Trincomalee and the funeral will be held.

summary_lines: R. Sampanthan, former TNA President, passed away. His funeral procession will travel from Colombo to his hometown, Trincomalee, for the final rites.
